page.title: 16LEISURE 2
page.content: Knighton Victoria Bowls Club has 110 playing members and 45 non-playing members.To be a members you must be a male and over 14. Carisbrooke Lawn Tennis Club started in 1929 .300 people are members. The Badminton Club on Holbrook Road is open to those over 18 on Thursdays. Within the Ellis Recreation Ground in Oadby is the swimming pool,a small field with flowers in and a car park. Oadby has a large sports complex. Leicester Race Course is 4.8k.m.s long.It has 30 meetings each year. There is a members stand,bars & refreshments.The track goes past Oadby & into Wigston. The Leicester Squash Club was opened in 1975. They have 10 courts and many facilities. The Oadby Municipal Golf Course covers 150 acres.
